title: Election Officials Warn of Efforts to Intimidate Voters
description: Drop-box watchers and disinformation about mail-in voting pose threats for election officials, who want to assure the public that voting is secure.
dc:creator: Neil Vigdor and Jon Hurdle
media:credit: Hannah Beier for The New York Times
media:description: A ballot drop box in Philadelphia. Election officials have warned of intensifying efforts to intimidate voters across the country.
